testCaseName: Authorize by token - Negative: Active access token exists

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Device Auth Service Implementation Tests - London Style

name: Authorize by token - Negative: Active access token exists

statusDetails.message:
Expecting throwable message:
  "token"
to contain:
  "Cannot authorize, there are some access tokens created"
but did not.

Throwable that failed the check:

com.connection.device.token.exception.DeviceAccessTokenExistsException: token
token: Cannot authorize, there are some access tokens created. New token will be available after their expiration.
description: active device access token already exists
